org.shared.array

Interface Array.IndexingOrder

  • Enclosing interface:
    Array<T extends Array<T,E>,E>

    public static interface Array.IndexingOrder
    An enumeration of internal storage orders for Arrays.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Array.IndexingOrder FAR
      An ordering where high indices vary most.
      static Array.IndexingOrder NEAR
      An ordering where low indices vary most.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Array.IndexingOrder reverse()
      Gets the reversed value.
      int[] strides(int[] dims)
      Creates strides for the given dimensions.

    • Field Detail

      • NEAR

        static final Array.IndexingOrder NEAR
        An ordering where low indices vary most.

      • FAR

        static final Array.IndexingOrder FAR
        An ordering where high indices vary most.

    • Method Detail

      • strides

        int[] strides(int[] dims)
        Creates strides for the given dimensions.
        Returns:
        the strides -- a vector such that its dot product with a logical index yields a physical index.

      • reverse

        Array.IndexingOrder reverse()
        Gets the reversed value.
